verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> who <S%G2192>had<s%> his <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G3583>withered.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They <S%G3906>watched<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> he would <S%G2323>heal<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> on the Sabbath <S%G4521>day,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G2723>accuse<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> "Is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> on the Sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%> to do <S%G15>good,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> to do <S%G2554>harm?<s%> To <S%G4982>save<s%> a <S%G5590>life,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> to <S%G615>kill?<s%>" <S%G1161>But<s%> they were <S%G4623>silent.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> When he had looked <S%G4017>around<s%> at <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3709>anger,<s%> being <S%G4818>grieved<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G4457>hardening<s%> <S%G2588>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G444>man,<s%> "Stretch <S%G1614>out<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G5495>hand.<s%>" He <S%G1614>stretched<s%> it <S%G1614>out,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> was <S%G600>restored<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5199>healthy<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G243>other.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2401>Idumaea,<s%> <S%G4008>beyond<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> from <S%G4012>around<s%> <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4605>Sidon.<s%> A <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude,<s%> <S%G191>hearing<s%> what great <S%G3745>things<s%> he <S%G4160>did,<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G2036>spoke<s%> <S%G3101>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> a little <S%G4142>boat<s%> should <S%G4342>stay<s%> near <S%G846>him<s%> because <S%G1223>of<s%> the <S%G3793>crowd,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that they <S%G2346>wouldn't<s%> press on <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> he had <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G4183>many,<s%> so <S%G5620>that<s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3148>diseases<s%> pressed <S%G1968>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> that they <S%G2443>might<s%> <S%G680>touch<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> <S%G3752>whenever<s%> they <S%G2334>saw<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> fell down <S%G4363>before<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2896>cried,<s%> <S%G3004><s%> <S%G4771>"You<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G3754>God!<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> He went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> to himself those <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2309>wanted,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G4160>appointed<s%> <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G649>send<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G649>out<s%> to <S%G2784>preach,<s%>

<S%G191>When<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3844>friends<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G1831>it,<s%> they went out to <S%G2902>seize<s%> <S%G846>him:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G3004>said,<s%> "He is <S%G3754>insane.<s%>"

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> came <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> "He <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G954>Beelzebul,<s%>" <S%G2532>and,<s%> <S%G1722>"By<s%> the <S%G758>prince<s%> of the <S%G1140>demons<s%> he casts <S%G1544>out<s%> the <S%G3754>demons.<s%>"

But <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> of the strong <S%G2478>man<s%> to <S%G1283>plunder,<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G4632><s%> <S%G3361>unless<s%> <S%G1210>he<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G1210>binds<s%> the strong <S%G2478>man;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> he will <S%G1283>plunder<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3614>house.<s%>

Most <S%G281>certainly<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G265>sins<s%> of the <S%G5207>descendants<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> will be <S%G863>forgiven,<s%> <S%G2532>including<s%> their <S%G988>blasphemies<s%> with <S%G3745>which<s%> they <S%G302>may<s%> <S%G987>blaspheme<s%>

A <S%G3793>multitude<s%> was <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G4012>around<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> they <S%G2036>told<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> sisters are <S%G1854>without<s%> looking for <S%G4571>you.<s%>"
